Rules:

Play on career (The difficulty is up to you but will be noted)

All parts must be recovered on land.

All parts must be recovered at or close to the KSC (any where on the flat ground around the KSC is fine).

All stages of the flight must be recoved.

If any part is destroyed in flight you have failed the Challenge, reload or try again.

As there is the risk of instance fail, you may back up your save files.

If you play on Custom you must start with 0 Science. This challenge is about start with the basics and not about jumping right away to SSTO.

Completion:

When you can build crafts in orbit by docking parts together you will of matered this challenge. But I would love to see what sort of mission you can do once you got to this point and still recover every part. Feel free to show off.

Mods:

This can be done stock, its hard getting to orbit at low teck levels but can be done. I encorage you to do this stock but if you want to use mod you can please list them.

Proof:

Screen shots of key missions would be nice but basicly just you word that you done it should be fine. Be sure to say what difficulty you're playing on.

I'm playing on Moderate, here a screen shot after I got jeb in to orbit for the first time. (This was the first stage)

At low tech, the only viable method is pure-vertical launch, to allow parachute recovery of first stage, followed by easy but inefficient second-stage-to-orbit.

The only real concern is getting the first stage's apogee high enough to allow you time to enter orbit with second stage, *before* the first stage falls back to 22km alt and vanishes in a puff of logic.
